name: Night of the Living Bread!
description:
Blast the Zombreads with a series of increasingly powerful weapons in order to protect Gary's "Bread n' Guns" Store. You play as the store's mascot, Branbo.

Pay The Reaper by Darren-Curtis | https://soundcloud.com/desperate-measurez

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
